User.description: The user associated with the expense claim.

Receipts.description: List of receipts submitted as part of the expense claim.

ExpenseClaimID.description: Unique identifier for the expense claim.

Payments.description: List of payments associated with the expense claim.

Status.description: The current status of the expense claim.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time when the expense claim was last updated in UTC timezone.

Total.description: The total sum of the expense claim.

AmountDue.description: The total amount due for the expense claim.

AmountPaid.description: The total amount paid for the expense claim.

PaymentDueDate.description: The date and time by which payment for the expense claim is due.

ReportingDate.description: The date and time when the expense claim was reported.
